HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Dostava unutar Hrvatske i Slovenije na iznos kupovine veći od 26,54€ je besplatna, a za iznose manje od 26,54€ naplaćuje se u iznosu od 5€.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Svaki naručeni artikl kurirska služba dostavlja u roku sedam radnih dana. Tijekom akcija moguća su manja kašnjenja prilikom obrade i isporuke narudžbi.

weekend_delivery.days: Dostava se vrši isključivo radnim danima. Izuzetak je dostava na otoke koja se uobičajeno vrši subotom.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke se vrši jednom tjedno - uobičajeno subotom.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery via DPD. A 'Click & Collect' option is mentioned, indicating in-store pickup is available, but no further details are provided on the shipping page. 
PRICING & DELIVERY TIME: Home delivery within Croatia and Slovenia is free for orders over €26.54 and costs €5 for orders below this amount. The standard delivery time is up to 7 working days, with potential extensions during sales periods. 
RESTRICTIONS & SPECIAL SERVICES: Deliveries are made on working days only. An exception is made for Croatian islands, where delivery occurs once a week, typically on Saturdays. There is no mention of an extra surcharge for island delivery. No information is available for express delivery, COD, parcel shops, or parcel lockers. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The website has a dedicated page for shipping information that clearly outlines the costs, provider, and standard delivery times. However, it lacks comprehensive details regarding the 'Click & Collect' service, COD payments, and any alternative or express delivery options.
